entries.description: Update Cilium to 1.14.3 and 1.13.8 and deprecate older patch releases (fixes CVE-2023-44487, CVE-2023-39347, CVE-2023-41333, CVE-2023-41332). Updating user clusters is strongly recommended.
Update curl to 8.4.0 (fixes CVE-2023-38545, CVE-2023-38546). curl is only available for usage in the optional web terminal feature.
EE only: Add KubeLB integration.
Support for Kubernetes 1.26.9, 1.27.6 and 1.28.2.
Support for propagating vSphere cluster tags to folders.
Support for configuring a base path in vSphere presets to construct the cluster folder path.
Support for Canal v3.26.1.
Support for enabling/disabling operating systems for machines of user clusters.
Support for encrypted root volumes in AWS.
VM anti-affinity setting for vSphere machine deployments.
Support for configuring multiple networks for vSphere.
Support multiple NodePort allowed IP ranges.
Support for configuring placement and sizing policy for machines on VMware Cloud Director.
Set default Kubernetes version to 1.27.6.
Update default CNI plugin to Cilium.
Update vSphere CCM to v1.27.2 for 1.27 user clusters.
Update etcd to 3.5.9.
Update metrics-server to 0.6.4.
Simplify rules in Azure NSG created for user clusters.
Mark MLA dashboards in Grafana as read-only.
Increase memory limit of kube-state-metrics addon to 600Mi.
Create a NetworkPolicy for user cluster kube-apiserver to access the Seed Kubernetes API.
Fix a bug where the datastore cluster value was not being propagated to the vSphere CSI driver.
Add missing cluster-autoscaler version for 1.27 user clusters.
Fix always defaulting allowed node port IP ranges for user clusters to 0.0.0.0/0 and ::/0, even when a more specific IP range was given.
Fix an issue in Applications which resulted in 'empty git-upload-pack given' errors for git sources.
Fix not applying 'x-kubernetes.io/distribution' label to RHEL nodes.
Add operating system profile to the machine deployment patch object.
Allow expansion of side navigation on small screen sizes.
Fix available version upgrades for CNI plugins not being properly deduced.
Fix network and IPv6 subnet pool options not loading during Openstack cluster creation.
Fix custom OSP value not selected when editing/customizing cluster template.
Fix support for Keycloak OIDC logout.
Fix the default value for CNI plugin version.
Fix API token for VMware Cloud Director from Preset was not being sourced to the cluster.
Recreate Hetzner CSIDriver to allow upgrade from 1.6.0 to 2.2.0.
Fix multiple empty panels in MLA dashboards.
Support for Kubernetes 1.24 and Kubernetes 1.25.
Remove unused v1 endpoints for KKP API.
OpenVPN for control plane to node connectivity has been deprecated. It will be removed in future releases of KKP. Upgrading all user cluster to Konnectivity is strongly recommended.
Deprecate Canal v3.23.
